item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar and restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Camilles - in Historic Federal Hill!

P-Collective member Michele has graciously offered to host this week's MNM and picked a place we've haven't been to yet! - yes, it really is true!

Camilles on Federal Hill is a classic. Renowned for its location and fabulous food, it seems that there is also a lovely patio terrace in the back that offers beautiful al fresco dining and also seems to have a large bar area for mingling and chatting the evening away - but we wouldn't know anything about that, would we......

So if you haven't been, where better to spend a warm summer evening than in the Roman Garden patio at Camilles socializing with friends. This one is worth knowing about, so let's check it out!

Michele will be wearing a white skirt with a pink polo shirt and glasses. Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Michelle is hosting, please look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Camilles!
